<iframe id="analysisBoard" src="_chess3.0.html?PGN=[Event "?"] [Site "?"] [Date "2022.04.12"] [Round "?"] [White "White"] [Black "Black"] [Result "*"] [FEN "rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/6P1/8/PPPPPP1P/RNBQKBNR b KQkq - 0 1"] [SetUp "1"] 1... f5 2. gxf5 *&flip=true&backgroundColor=transparent&handicap=2" style="visibility:hidden;" onload="this.style.visibility='visible';"></iframe>

<script data-name="injectScript" data-version="v0.1">
  var backgroundColor = encodeURIComponent(window.getComputedStyle( document.body ,null).getPropertyValue('background-color'))
	var injectScript = (src) => {
		return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
			const script = document.createElement('script');
			script.src = src;
			script.async = true;
			script.onload = resolve;
			script.onerror = reject;
			document.head.appendChild(script);
		});
	};

	var errorCheck;


	if (Persistence.isAvailable()) {
		errorCheck = Persistence.getItem("errorCheck");
		Persistence.clear();
	}
</script>

<script>
	var PGN = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:PGN}}`);
	document.getElementById("analysisBoard").src = `_ChessTempoViewer.html?PGN=` + PGN + `&flip=true&errorCheck=` + errorCheck + `&backgroundColor=` + backgroundColor + ``;
</script>

<iframe id="Board" src="_chess3.0.html?PGN=[Event "?"] [Site "?"] [Date "2022.04.12"] [Round "?"] [White "White"] [Black "Black"] [Result "*"] [FEN "rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/6P1/8/PPPPPP1P/RNBQKBNR b KQkq - 0 1"] [SetUp "1"] 1... f5 2. gxf5 *&flip=true&backgroundColor=transparent&handicap=2" style="visibility:hidden;" onload="this.style.visibility='visible';"></iframe>

<script>
   var backgroundColor = encodeURIComponent(window.getComputedStyle( document.body ,null).getPropertyValue('background-color'))
	var handicap = 2;
	var PGN = `{{text:PGN}}`.replace(/\[Puzzle_Length.*?\]/, '').replace(/\[Tactic_line.*?\]/, ''); //compatability with chess.com puzzles
	var PGN = encodeURIComponent(PGN);
	document.getElementById("Board").src = `_chess3.0.html?PGN=` + PGN + `&flip=true&backgroundColor=` + backgroundColor + `&handicap=` + handicap + ``;
	var errorCheck = false;
document.getElementById("Board").allowTransparency = true;
	if (Persistence.isAvailable()) {
		if (typeof window.addEventListener != 'undefined') {
			window.addEventListener('message', function(e) {
				errorCheck = true;
				Persistence.setItem("errorCheck", errorCheck);
			}, false);
		}
	}

</script>
